tribe_name: Tule River Indian Tribe of the Tule River Reservation, California

awards.recipient_name_raw: TULE RIVER INDIAN TRIBE OF THE TULE RIVER RESERVATION, CALIFORNIA
TULE RIVER INDIAN TRIBE OF THE TULE RIVER RESERVATION, CALIFORNIA
awards.description:
THIS AGREEMENT IS TO PROVIDE ASSISTANCE TO THE TULE RIVER TRIBE TO BUILD ITS CAPACITY TO ADMINISTER ENVIRONMENTAL PROGRAMS ON INDIAN LANDS. SPECIFICALLY, THE RECIPIENT WILL MANAGE AN ENVIRONMENTAL OFFICE, DEVELOP OUTREACH MATERIALS AND CONDUCT EVENTS, ATTEND ENVIRONMENTAL MEETINGS, BUILD GIS TECHNICAL CAPACITY, AND DEVELOP A SOLID WASTE MANAGEMENT PROGRAM.

THIS AGREEMENT PROVIDES FEDERAL FUNDING IN THE AMOUNT OF $147,000. REFER TO TERMS AND CONDITIONS.

awards.awarding_agency: Department of Housing and Urban Development
